title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.16 - Hearings; oral argument or brief; representation cases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.16 - Hearings; oral argument or brief; representation cases

State Regulations

At the close of hearings in a proceeding under section
705, the hearing officer shall permit the parties to electronically file briefs
or written statements. The time for filing such briefs or written statements
shall be fixed by the hearing officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.16

Renumbered from 253.42

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
